description: The Red Rose, also known as the symbol of love, is a stunning and classic flower. With its rich, velvety petals and captivating fragrance, the Red Rose is a timeless choice for expressing deep affection and romance.
name: Red Rose

description: The Yellow Tulip is a vibrant and cheerful flower that symbolizes happiness and positivity. Its bright, sunny color and elegant shape make it a perfect choice for brightening up any occasion.
name: Yellow Tulip

description: The White Lily is an exquisite and pure flower that signifies purity, virtue, and renewal. With its graceful petals and delicate fragrance, the White Lily is often associated with new beginnings.
name: White Lily

description: The Orchid is a striking and exotic flower known for its vibrant colors and intricate shapes. It represents luxury, beauty, and strength. Orchids come in various shades and patterns, making each one unique.
name: Orchid

description: The Lavender Blossom is a fragrant and calming flower associated with serenity and relaxation. Its soothing scent and elegant appearance make it a popular choice for aromatherapy and decor.
name: Lavender Blossom

description: The Pink Peony is a delicate and charming flower that symbolizes good fortune and compassion. Its soft pink petals and lush appearance make it a favorite in gardens and bouquets.
name: Pink Peony

description: The Sunflower is a cheerful and vibrant flower that represents adoration, loyalty, and longevity. Its golden petals and bright center make it a symbol of happiness and positivity.
name: Sunflower

description: The Blue Iris is an elegant and striking flower that symbolizes faith and wisdom. Its deep blue-purple hue and intricate petals make it a unique and enchanting choice for arrangements.
name: Blue Iris

description: The Daisy is a simple yet charming flower that signifies innocence and purity. With its white petals and sunny center, the Daisy is a symbol of freshness and new beginnings.
name: Daisy

description: The Calla Lily is an elegant and sophisticated flower known for its trumpet-shaped blooms. It represents purity and beauty. Calla Lilies are often used in weddings and formal arrangements.
name: Calla Lily
